00022 AnalogueModel* PhyLayer::getAnalogueModelFromName(std::string name, ParameterMap& params) const {
00023 
00024   if (name == "SimplePathlossModel")
00025   {
00026     return initializeSimplePathlossModel(params);
00027   }
00028   else if (name == "LogNormalShadowing")
00029   {
00030     return initializeLogNormalShadowing(params);
00031   }
00032   else if (name == "JakesFading")
00033   {
00034     return initializeJakesFading(params);
00035   }
00036   else if(name == "BreakpointPathlossModel")
00037   {
00038     return initializeBreakpointPathlossModel(params);
00039   } else if(name == "PERModel")
00040   {
00041     return initializePERModel(params);
00042   }
00043   return BasePhyLayer::getAnalogueModelFromName(name, params);
00044 }
00045 
00046 AnalogueModel* PhyLayer::initializeLogNormalShadowing(ParameterMap& params) const {
00047   double mean = params["mean"].doubleValue();
00048   double stdDev = params["stdDev"].doubleValue();
00049   simtime_t interval = params["interval"].doubleValue();
00050 
00051   return new LogNormalShadowing(mean, stdDev, interval);
00052 }
00053 
00054 AnalogueModel* PhyLayer::initializeJakesFading(ParameterMap& params) const {
00055   int fadingPaths = params["fadingPaths"].longValue();
00056   simtime_t delayRMS = params["delayRMS"].doubleValue();
00057   simtime_t interval = params["interval"].doubleValue();
00058 
00059   double carrierFrequency = 2.412e+9;
00060   if(params.count("carrierFrequency") > 0) {
00061     carrierFrequency = params["carrierFrequency"];
00062   }
00063   else {
00064     if (cc->hasPar("carrierFrequency")) {
00065       carrierFrequency = cc->par("carrierFrequency").doubleValue();
00066     }
00067   }
00068 
00069   return new JakesFading(fadingPaths, delayRMS, carrierFrequency, interval);
00070 }

00072 AnalogueModel* PhyLayer::initializeBreakpointPathlossModel(ParameterMap& params) const {
00073   double alpha1 =-1, alpha2=-1, breakpointDistance=-1;
00074   double L01=-1, L02=-1;
00075   double carrierFrequency = 2.412e+9;
00076   bool useTorus = world->useTorus();
00077   const Coord& playgroundSize = *(world->getPgs());
00078   ParameterMap::iterator it;
00079 
00080   it = params.find("alpha1");
00081   if ( it != params.end() ) // parameter alpha1 has been specified in config.xml
00082   {
00083     // set alpha1
00084     alpha1 = it->second.doubleValue();
00085     coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): alpha1 set from config.xml to " << alpha1 << endl;
00086     // check whether alpha is not smaller than specified in ConnectionManager
00087     if(cc->hasPar("alpha") && alpha1 < cc->par("alpha").doubleValue())
00088     {
00089           // throw error
00090       opp_error("TestPhyLayer::createPathLossModel(): alpha can't be smaller than specified in \
00091                  ConnectionManager. Please adjust your config.xml file accordingly");
00092     }
00093   }
00094   it = params.find("L01");
00095   if(it != params.end()) {
00096     L01 = it->second.doubleValue();
00097   }
00098   it = params.find("L02");
00099   if(it != params.end()) {
00100     L02 = it->second.doubleValue();
00101   }
00102 
00103   it = params.find("alpha2");
00104   if ( it != params.end() ) // parameter alpha1 has been specified in config.xml
00105   {
00106     // set alpha2
00107     alpha2 = it->second.doubleValue();
00108     coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): alpha2 set from config.xml to " << alpha2 << endl;
00109     // check whether alpha is not smaller than specified in ConnectionManager
00110     if(cc->hasPar("alpha") && alpha2 < cc->par("alpha").doubleValue())
00111     {
00112           // throw error
00113       opp_error("TestPhyLayer::createPathLossModel(): alpha can't be smaller than specified in \
00114                  ConnectionManager. Please adjust your config.xml file accordingly");
00115     }
00116   }
00117   it = params.find("breakpointDistance");
00118   if ( it != params.end() ) // parameter alpha1 has been specified in config.xml
00119   {
00120     breakpointDistance = it->second.doubleValue();
00121     coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): breakpointDistance set from config.xml to " << alpha2 << endl;
00122     // check whether alpha is not smaller than specified in ConnectionManager
00123   }
00124 
00125   // get carrierFrequency from config
00126   it = params.find("carrierFrequency");
00127 
00128   if ( it != params.end() ) // parameter carrierFrequency has been specified in config.xml
00129   {
00130     // set carrierFrequency
00131     carrierFrequency = it->second.doubleValue();
00132     coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency set from config.xml to " << carrierFrequency << endl;
00133 
00134     // check whether carrierFrequency is not smaller than specified in ConnectionManager
00135     if(cc->hasPar("carrierFrequency") && carrierFrequency < cc->par("carrierFrequency").doubleValue())
00136     {
00137       // throw error
00138       opp_error("TestPhyLayer::createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency can't be smaller than specified in \
00139                  ConnectionManager. Please adjust your config.xml file accordingly");
00140     }
00141   }
00142   else // carrierFrequency has not been specified in config.xml
00143   {
00144     if (cc->hasPar("carrierFrequency")) // parameter carrierFrequency has been specified in ConnectionManager
00145     {
00146       // set carrierFrequency according to ConnectionManager
00147       carrierFrequency = cc->par("carrierFrequency").doubleValue();
00148       coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency set from ConnectionManager to " << carrierFrequency << endl;
00149     }
00150     else // carrierFrequency has not been specified in ConnectionManager
00151     {
00152       // keep carrierFrequency at default value
00153       coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency set from default value to " << carrierFrequency << endl;
00154     }
00155   }
00156 
00157   if(alpha1 ==-1 || alpha2==-1 || breakpointDistance==-1 || L01==-1 || L02==-1) {
00158     opp_error("Undefined parameters for breakpointPathlossModel. Please check your configuration.");
00159   }
00160 
00161   return new BreakpointPathlossModel(L01, L02, alpha1, alpha2, breakpointDistance, carrierFrequency, useTorus, playgroundSize, coreDebug);
00162 
00163 }

00165 AnalogueModel* PhyLayer::initializeSimplePathlossModel(ParameterMap& params) const {
00166 
00167   // init with default value
00168   double alpha = 3.5;
00169   double carrierFrequency = 2.412e+9;
00170   bool useTorus = world->useTorus();
00171   const Coord& playgroundSize = *(world->getPgs());
00172 
00173   // get alpha-coefficient from config
00174   ParameterMap::iterator it = params.find("alpha");
00175 
00176   if ( it != params.end() ) // parameter alpha has been specified in config.xml
00177   {
00178     // set alpha
00179     alpha = it->second.doubleValue();
00180     coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): alpha set from config.xml to " << alpha << endl;
00181 
00182     // check whether alpha is not smaller than specified in ConnectionManager
00183     if(cc->hasPar("alpha") && alpha < cc->par("alpha").doubleValue())
00184     {
00185           // throw error
00186       opp_error("TestPhyLayer::createPathLossModel(): alpha can't be smaller than specified in \
00187                  ConnectionManager. Please adjust your config.xml file accordingly");
00188     }
00189   }
00190   else // alpha has not been specified in config.xml
00191   {
00192     if (cc->hasPar("alpha")) // parameter alpha has been specified in ConnectionManager
00193     {
00194       // set alpha according to ConnectionManager
00195       alpha = cc->par("alpha").doubleValue();
00196       coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): alpha set from ConnectionManager to " << alpha << endl;
00197     }
00198     else // alpha has not been specified in ConnectionManager
00199     {
00200       // keep alpha at default value
00201       coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): alpha set from default value to " << alpha << endl;
00202     }
00203   }
00204 
00205   // get carrierFrequency from config
00206   it = params.find("carrierFrequency");
00207 
00208   if ( it != params.end() ) // parameter carrierFrequency has been specified in config.xml
00209   {
00210     // set carrierFrequency
00211     carrierFrequency = it->second.doubleValue();
00212     coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency set from config.xml to " << carrierFrequency << endl;
00213 
00214     // check whether carrierFrequency is not smaller than specified in ConnectionManager
00215     if(cc->hasPar("carrierFrequency") && carrierFrequency < cc->par("carrierFrequency").doubleValue())
00216     {
00217       // throw error
00218       opp_error("TestPhyLayer::createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency can't be smaller than specified in \
00219                  ConnectionManager. Please adjust your config.xml file accordingly");
00220     }
00221   }
00222   else // carrierFrequency has not been specified in config.xml
00223   {
00224     if (cc->hasPar("carrierFrequency")) // parameter carrierFrequency has been specified in ConnectionManager
00225     {
00226       // set carrierFrequency according to ConnectionManager
00227       carrierFrequency = cc->par("carrierFrequency").doubleValue();
00228       coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency set from ConnectionManager to " << carrierFrequency << endl;
00229     }
00230     else // carrierFrequency has not been specified in ConnectionManager
00231     {
00232       // keep carrierFrequency at default value
00233       coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency set from default value to " << carrierFrequency << endl;
00234     }
00235   }
00236 
00237   return new SimplePathlossModel(alpha, carrierFrequency, useTorus, playgroundSize, coreDebug);
00238 
00239 }

00241 AnalogueModel* PhyLayer::initializePERModel(ParameterMap& params) const {
00242   double per = params["packetErrorRate"].doubleValue();
00243   return new PERModel(per);
00244 }
00245 
00246 Decider* PhyLayer::getDeciderFromName(std::string name, ParameterMap& params) {
00247   if(name == "Decider80211") {
00248     protocolId = IEEE_80211;
00249     return initializeDecider80211(params);
00250   }
00251   else if(name == "SNRThresholdDecider"){
00252     protocolId = GENERIC;
00253     return initializeSNRThresholdDecider(params);
00254   }
00255   else if(name == "Decider802154Narrow") {
00256     protocolId = IEEE_802154_NARROW;
00257     return initializeDecider802154Narrow(params);
00258   }
00259 
00260   return BasePhyLayer::getDeciderFromName(name, params);
00261 }
00262 
00263 Decider* PhyLayer::initializeDecider80211(ParameterMap& params) {
00264   double threshold = params["threshold"];
00265   return new Decider80211(this, threshold, sensitivity,
00266               radio->getCurrentChannel(),
00267               findHost()->getIndex(), coreDebug);
00268 }
00269 
00270 Decider* PhyLayer::initializeDecider802154Narrow(ParameterMap& params) {
00271   int sfdLength = params["sfdLength"];
00272   double berLowerBound = params["berLowerBound"];
00273   std::string modulation = params["modulation"].stringValue();
00274   return new Decider802154Narrow(this, findHost()->getIndex(), coreDebug, sfdLength, berLowerBound, modulation, headerLength, recordStats);
00275 }
00276 
00277 Decider* PhyLayer::initializeSNRThresholdDecider(ParameterMap& params)
00278 {
00279   double snrThreshold = 0;
00280   if(params.count("snrThreshold") == 1) {
00281     snrThreshold = params["snrThreshold"];
00282   }
00283   else if(params.count("threshold") == 1) {
00284     snrThreshold = params["threshold"];
00285   }
00286   else {
00287     opp_warning("No SNR threshold defined in config.xml for Decider!");
00288   }
00289 
00290   double busyThreshold = sensitivity;
00291   if(params.count("busyThreshold") == 0) {
00292     ev << "No busy threshold defined for SNRThresholdDecider. Using"
00293        << " phy layers sensitivity as busy threshold." << endl;
00294   } else {
00295     busyThreshold = params["busyThreshold"];
00296   }
00297 
00298   return new SNRThresholdDecider(this, snrThreshold,
00299                    sensitivity, busyThreshold,
00300                    findHost()->getIndex(), coreDebug);
00301 }
